main event: A cigar-shaped object, approximately 40 feet long and illuminated from within, was observed in the sky over Laurel, Maryland on June 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object moved rapidly and silently, made a very sharp turn, then accelerated and disappeared.
The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds.
The witness reported the sighting to the Laurel Police Department immediately.
The object was observed on a clear night sky from the witness's home in Laurel, Maryland.
The witness described the object as cigar-shaped and approximately 40 feet long.
sighted object: cigar-shaped object, approximately 40 feet long, illuminated from within
